page.title: 02BREWING IN STOCKPORT
page.content:
F.Robinson Ltd have been brewing beer at their Hillgate brewery for 150 yrs. Three of the founders relatives Peter, David and Dennis are now the present owners. The Stockport brewery covers 5 acres and employs 250 people.
It takes 2 weeks to brew high quality beer. The ingredients used include malt, hops, sugar, barley, wheat, oats and grist. From these materials they make different varieties of beer. Some of them are Old Tom, lager, bitter and mild
Robinsons distribute their beer to over 300 pubs throughout the North West and North Wales using 50 barrel tankers or lorries. They also own shire horses which are used for advertising their beers, mainly at carnivals..
